meanings: [명사] forgiveness, pardon, mercy, [동사] forgive, excuse, pardon

vlive.english: Right teacher... You will forgive us right?

vlive.korean: 그를 용서한 건 잘한 일이야 - 마리!
vlive.english: You did a great job when you forgave him. - Marie!

vlive.korean: 내가 너에게 용서를 구한다 - 너 왜 몽쉘 두 박스 안 사 오냐?
vlive.english: I beg for your forgiveness. - Why didn't you buy two boxes of it?

vlive.korean: 4주년이니까 참아야지 - 모든게 다 오늘은 용서가 되나요?
vlive.english: Hold it in since it's our 4th anniversary. - Then everything's forgivable today?

examples.english: He was excused by reason of his age.

examples.korean: 그는 자신이 한 짓에 대해 용서를 구했다.
examples.english: He begged forgiveness for what he had done.
She preached to the congregation about forgiveness.

examples.korean: 그는 그녀에게 그녀를 속인 것에 대해 용서를 구했다.
examples.english: He asked her pardon for having deceived her.

examples.korean: 상황으로 보아 그의 무례는 용서할 수 있는 것이었다.
examples.english: His rudeness was forgivable in the circumstances.
